Looking at the decoded intcode:
19690720 = (810,000 * n + 1,870,666) + v

n = floor( (19,690,720 - 1,870,666) / 810,000 ) = 22
v = remainder( (19,690,720 - 1,870,666) / 810,000 ) = 54

the Noun-Verb code is 2254!
